Spend_Authorization_Line_Data.description: Element that encapsulates all of the expense item attributes (acct number, business topics, reservation number, ticket number, country, origination travel location, destination travel location, hotel, car rental agency, airline, attendee).  These attributes are configurable for the expense item.  Only the attributes that are set up for the expense item should be entered.  All others will be wiped out.

Spend_Authorization_Data.description: Element that encapsulates all data for one Spend Authorization Line (Expense Item, Quantity, Unit Cost, Billable flag, Worktags, and Memo).

validation.validation: The following Accounting Worktags are required but have not been assigned: [missing].
The following Accounting Worktag types are invalid: [invalid].
Can not have any combination of Project, Project Phase or Project Task worktags for the same line.
validation.description: Can not have any combination of Project, Project Phase or Project Task worktags for the same line.

validation.validation: Cash advances are not enabled in your tenant.
validation.description: Cash advances are not enabled in your tenant.

validation.validation: Only one worktag for each type is allowed for each document line.
validation.description: Only one worktag for each type is allowed for each document line.

validation.validation: Unit Cost is not enterable for item - [item]. Unit Cost will be calculated based on quantity and information entered for expense item details.
validation.description: Unit Cost is not enterable for fixed expense items that use expense rate tables.

validation.validation: Unit Cost is required for item - [item].
validation.description: Unit Cost is required for non-fixed expense items and fixed expense items that does not use expense rate tables.

validation.validation: Quantity is required for item - [item].
validation.description: Quantity is required for the expense item.

validation.validation: The Expense Item Details Reference Element is required for item - [item].
validation.description: The Expense Item Details Reference Element is required for the expense item.

validation.validation: Invalid Unit Cost for item - [item]. Unit Cost is greater then maximum allowed amount. View the Expense Item details for maximum amount allowed.
validation.description: Spend Authorization Line: Invalid unit cost for Expense Item. Unit Cost is greater then maximum allowed amount. View the Expense Item details for maximum amount allowed.

validation.validation: Invalid Unit Cost for fixed unit cost item - [item]. Unit Cost cannot be changed.
validation.description: Spend Authorization Line: Invalid unit cost for fixed amount Expense Item. Unit Cost cannot be changed.

Financials_Attachment_Data.description: Text attribute identifying Content Type of the Attachment.
Text attribute identifying Filename of the Attachment.
Text attribute identifying Encoding of the Attachment.
Boolean attribute identifying whether the Attachment is compressed.

Spend_Authorization_Data.description: Encapsulating element containing all Business Document Attachment data.

validation.validation: If a file name is specified for a Financial Attachment, File Content and Content Type are required.
The Spend Authorization Estimated Amount is required if no Spend Authorization Lines have been entered.
validation.description: The Spend Authorization Estimated Amount is required if no Spend Authorization Lines have been entered.

validation.validation: The field End Date is required and must have a value.
validation.description: The field End Date is required and must have a value.

validation.validation: Enter a Start Date that is before the End Date. OR Enter an End Date that is after the Start Date.
validation.description: Enter a Start Date that is before the End Date. OR Enter an End Date that is after the Start Date.

validation.validation: Spend authorization contains more than one instance of the balancing worktag. If you enable cash advances and balancing worktags, all lines of the spend authorization must match.
validation.description: Spend authorization contains more than one instance of the balancing worktag. If you enable cash advances and balancing worktags, all lines of the spend authorization must match.

validation.validation: The Reimbursement Payment Type Reference is required and must have a value.
validation.description: The Reimbursement Payment Type Reference is required and must have a value.

validation.validation: Cash Advance has been paid and cannot be updated.
validation.description: Cash Advance has been paid and cannot be updated.

validation.validation: You must complete at least one Spend Authorization Line.
Spend Authorization contains different instances of optional balancing worktags. If you enable cash advances and balancing worktags, all lines of the spend authorization must match.
validation.description: Spend Authorization contains different instances of optional balancing worktags. If you enable cash advances and balancing worktags, all lines of the spend authorization must match.

validation.validation: The Total Reimbursement Amount must be greater than 0.
validation.description: The Total Spend Authorization Amount with or without Spend Lines must be greater than zero.

validation.validation: The Total Cash Advance Requested Amount must be greater than 0.
validation.description: The Total Cash Advance Requested Amount must be greater than 0.

validation.validation: Committee is a required field.
The External Committee Member is not active for the Spend Authorization Date. Enter a Spend Authorization Date for an active External Committee Member.
[ecm] is not a member of [committee].
You can only use Committee if the Expense Payee is an External Committee Member.
You can't change the spend authorization.
validation.description: You can't change the spend authorization.
